Articles.Content:
I saw this the other day, snapped a photo

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/sECnH)

It's actually a terrible rum. There are much much much better ones out there.

But a jocular reference indeed!

Does it eject you from the solar system at a high fraction of the speed of light when you open the bottle?

Also, ibtl.

*"* *Does it eject you from the solar system at a high fraction of the speed of light when you open the bottle?"*

No - that's the hangover effect the next morning. (I prefer Flor de Cana, myself)

> 
> Does it eject you from the solar system at a high fraction of the speed of light when you open the bottle?
> Also, ibtl.

That sounds more like the effect of a Pangalactic Gargleblaster

> 
> That sounds more like the effect of a Pangalactic Gargleblaster

No no, as per my signature, a Pangalactic Gargleblaster affects you much like having your brains smashed out by a slice of lemon wrapped round a large gold brick.

Kraken rum just made me gag.

Are my eyes deceiving me or does that label actually say 47%? Even for a rum that's pretty strong.

I wonder how long this thread will last. Even the slightest reference to booze will get a thread locked.

Made from the blood of a Kraken?

*Edit-*

...just saw this on the web lol.

![Kraken+found+on+tumblr_5b3d72_4520925.jpg](http://static.fjcdn.com/pictures/Kraken+found+on+tumblr_5b3d72_4520925.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T19:18:19Z" title="05/21/2015 07:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by LordFerret**

Hey guys, nice find, I saw a bottle of this not too long ago but I'm not keen on spirits.

Oh and just as a reminder of rule 2.2C, "Adult content, such as nudity, sexually suggestive or explicit images, gore and drugs;", as long as this topic stays away from anything harder than alcohol we should be fine ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Is there a non alcoholic drink for those of us kerbals that are under age and/or are apposed to drinking for moral/religious reasons?

Pretty meh rum, my wife bought a bottle because she liked the kraken on itÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ but dumped into some tropical drink, and no one notices (particularly later in the night).

Ages ago in college, we had a couple of space-drinks we made. 

Lunar Sunrise (tequila sunrise, but with Tang, not OJ)

Apollo-Soyuz (a screwdriver---with Tang instead of OJ)

> 
> Is there a non alcoholic drink for those of us kerbals that are under age and/or are apposed to drinking for moral/religious reasons?

Shirley Temple? Kerbals launch higher than most religious temples.... semi-related!
im not really a big fan of rum. im more a tequila kind of guy.
